question: What nickname did CNN International give to Bursa due to its automotive industry?
asked_question_translated: Que alcunha deu a CNN International a Bursa devido à sua indústria automóvel?
answer: A CNN International deu a alcunha de "Detroit da Turquia" a Bursa devido à sua indústria automóvel.
answer_translated_eng: CNN International has nicknamed Bursa the "Detroit of Turkey" because of its car industry.
